titleStmt.title: Iurisdiction regall, episcopall, papall Wherein is declared how the Pope hath intruded vpon the iurisdiction of temporall princes, and of the Church. The intrusion is discouered, and the peculiar and distinct iurisdiction to each properly belonging, recouered. Written by George Carleton.
titleStmt.author: Carleton, George, 1559-1628.

notesStmt.note: The words "regall, episcopall, papall" are bracketed together on the title page.
Printed by William Stansby. Cf. STC.
Reproduction of the original in Yale University Library.
